title: If this games balance was determined by this board how would it be like?
body:
I imagine it like this:

_Patch 6.4 notes_

_Zed's oppressive harass and ultimate nerfed._
"Due to the outcry of the ~~boards~~ community we have have acknowledged that they are right and Zed is overpowered. An assassin shouldn't be able to 100-0 an immobile mage we just can't have that, his ultimate has absolutely no counterplay and Zed doesn't have to commit, and even though Zed's Q does 10% less damage from the his Living Shadow it's still to much. Based on the ~~boards~~ community's feedback, our balance team has compiled two fair changes that will make Zed balanced."

W-Living Shadow range reduced 700>250

_New_
R-Death Mark
Zed becomes untargetable for 0.2 seconds and dashed behind a target enemy champion. Upon arrival Zed is exhausted, the enemy champion is healed based on level, the enemy champion is shielded based on level, and all debuffs on the enemy champion are disabled. After Zed spawns a shadow at the cast location that last for 6 seconds, after 5 seconds Zed can reactivate Death Mark to blink back to the shadows location.

_New Item_
"AD Assassins are currently too strong and AP mages need an item to to defend against them and be the AP equivalent of Maw of Malmortious"
Cloak Of Deletion
+120 Ability Power
+300 Armor
+500 Health
_Unique Active:_
This targeted ability disconnects a player from the game for 300 seconds if the primary or secondary attribute of their champion is marked "Assassin" (300 sec cooldown).

But seriously I'm glad Riot barely takes anything on here seriously

Heh.. oh, to be naïve again... Oh no, as you stay on the boards longer, you'll find out that some of them are so serious that you'll gain an appreciation for Riot not giving much thought to what the boards say. You won't be happy about them disregarding some of the information, but most of it you'll be thankful for.

I've been on the boards for years (if you include the old one)... I think I just automatically filter out the ridiculous balance suggestions people post. Then you're left with the more reasonable opinions. ;) I guess that makes me naive in a way, still.

Holy shit. If the boards were in charge of balance, champions would get deleted and nerfed every other week until everyone's having wet noodle fights constantly. Team fights would take forever because no one would deal any damage, and games would stretch on until the freaking end of time as well.

The back and forth would just be perpetual BS because no one on the boards knows how this game works. It's too complex for many people to know that, and it's way too complicated to attain true balance. Then again, true balance doesn't matter to anyone but the pros; in normal gameplay in the community, we most certainly would find something to complain about if the game were 100% perfectly balanced. See the numerous examples about katarina and hiemer's win rates in the lcs compared to solo queue... etc, etc, this argument has been made before from this point on.
It would vary so strongly from week to week that we'd never know what any champ did.
